name: TabGarb Pro
author: Webgarb

sections.description:
TabGarb is a WordPress plugin which gives your wordpress a power to change content into Javascript tab enable content very easily, Tabgarb use HTML comment tags in place of using tags like [ (tabs), [tabs] , {tabs} ] which make your content wordpress friendly ( TabGarb Formatting tag will not spoil your content in case TabGarb is not installed in your wordpress ).
TabGarb come with editable css theme ( you can edit tabs css from your admin panel easly ) and you can change the speed and effect of changing tab direct from TabGarb Settings in WordPress admin.
New feature
2.3 : Add normal Page Load Functionality (using this make your post/page fast load).

More information will be found here

We are continue updating our plugin Thanks for your all support and comments. !

Updates
* TabGarb now has language support. ( you can contribute the language translation to tabgarb it will be gr8 help thanks ).

Usage
Usage information will be found here

Please Mention About this plugin
Please Mention about this plugin and help to improve more ..
Please comment what you think about this plugin at here .!

Thank you very much.

,Ayush
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Download TabGarb and unzip it .
  2. Upload tabgarb folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory in your server.
  3. Activate the TabGarb plugin under the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

Usage
Usage information will be found here
sections.faq:
Any Question

Visit TabGarb Page if you have any question http://webgarb.com/tabgarb/
sections.changelog:
2.6

  • Language Support
  • Script Loading Fixed.

2.5

  • Text Modfication.
  • Fixed ajax double loading problem
  • Added Unique URL for every MODE of Tab using HASH
  • Added Cache System In style.php, Now this will improved load time by more then 3x
  • Link Feature to Tabs ( Now you can attach link redirect when user will click tab )
  • Now can move tabs to bottom of content

2.0

  • Introducing TabGarb Pro

1.5.1

  • Comment formating replaced with bb short code please check usage again by going to http://webgarb.com/tabgarb/

1.5

  • CSS Compresser fixed.

1.4.3

  • Interface for admin bug fixed.

1.4.2

  • Fixed long content problem

1.4.1

  • Tabs Rendering on Blog and front pages!
  • Debug Improved.

1.4

  • Support to add content above Tabs.
  • Style Sheet is Shift to Under Head ( Fast Css Load Now )

1.3

  • Method Option added Normal tabs load ( This option will make your page load fast. )
  • Fix Debug Error Rendering Problem.

1.1

  • Fix Function Redeclaring Problem.

1.0

  • IE (Internet Explorer Fix).
  • Jquery Load Fix .

Beta

  • Just Released !
